Uses of Interface
org.jgapcustomised.BulkFitnessFunction

  • Packages that use BulkFitnessFunction 
    Package Description
    com.anji.integration
    com.anji.integration contains classes that provide the glue between the various components of the system, including artificial neural net implementations, JGAP, NEAT, Log4J, and persistence and presentation layers.
    com.anji.neat
    com.anji.neat contains classes implementing NEAT framework, including genes, mutation operators, and fitness function used for XOR.
    com.anji.util
    com.anji.util contains utility classes used in the ANJI framework.
    ojc.ahni.evaluation  
    ojc.ahni.experiments  
    ojc.ahni.experiments.objectrecognition  
    org.jgapcustomised  

    • Uses of BulkFitnessFunction in com.anji.integration

      Classes in com.anji.integration that implement BulkFitnessFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExponentialTargetFitnessFunction
      Fitness function where error is exponential; i.e., as the error gets closer to 0, the fitness increases exponentially, at a greater rate than simply squaring the error.
      class  RandomFitnessFunction
      Assigns random fitness for each chromosome.
      class  TargetFitnessFunction
      Determines fitness based on how close Activator output is to a target.

    • Uses of BulkFitnessFunction in com.anji.neat

      Classes in com.anji.neat that implement BulkFitnessFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NeatTargetFitnessFunction
      Fitness function where error is subtracted from max fitness, then squared.

    • Uses of BulkFitnessFunction in com.anji.util

      Classes in com.anji.util that implement BulkFitnessFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DummyBulkFitnessFunction 

    • Uses of BulkFitnessFunction in ojc.ahni.evaluation

      Classes in ojc.ahni.evaluation that implement BulkFitnessFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BulkFitnessFunctionMT
      Provides a base for multi-threaded bulk fitness functions.
      class  HyperNEATFitnessFunction
      Provides a base for fitness functions for use with HyperNEAT.
      class  HyperNEATTargetFitnessFunction
      Given a set of genotypes that encode a neural network, and a set of training examples consisting of input and target (desired) output pattern pairs, determines fitness based on how close the output of the network encoded by each genome is to the target output given some input.
      class  TargetFitnessFunctionMT
      Given a set of genotypes that encode a neural network, and a set of training examples consisting of input and target (desired) output pattern pairs, determines fitness based on how close the output of the network encoded by each genome is to the target output given some input.

    • Uses of BulkFitnessFunction in ojc.ahni.experiments

      Classes in ojc.ahni.experiments that implement BulkFitnessFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RetinaProblemFitnessFunction
      Implements the Left and Right Retina Problem as described in Constraining Connectivity to Encourage Modularity in HyperNEAT (2011) In: Proceedings of the Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference (GECCO 2011).
      class  TestTargetFitnessFunction
      A test fitness function that determines fitness based on how close the output of a network is to a target output given some input.
      class  TestTargetFitnessFunctionNEAT
      A test fitness function that determines fitness based on how close the output of a network is to a target output given some input.

    • Uses of BulkFitnessFunction in ojc.ahni.experiments.objectrecognition

    • Uses of BulkFitnessFunction in org.jgapcustomised

      Methods in org.jgapcustomised that return BulkFitnessFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BulkFitnessFunction Configuration.getBulkFitnessFunction()
      Retrieves the bulk fitness function previously setup in this Configuration object.
      Methods in org.jgapcustomised with parameters of type BulkFitnessFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Configuration.setBulkFitnessFunction(BulkFitnessFunction a_functionToSet)
      Sets the bulk fitness function to be used for this genetic algorithm.
